Class NetworkHelper

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Helper class for creating, and retrieving data from HttpURLConnection

    3.0

    Kyle Kroboth

        Sets the proxy used for opening up connections.
        Parameters:
        proxy - the new proxy
        See Also:

      • getLogger

        public org.slf4j.Logger getLogger()

      • setDefaultHeader

        public void setDefaultHeader(String name,
                    String value)
        Sets default header for connections. If the connection has the same header, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        name - header name
        value - header value

      • removeDefaultHeader

        public String removeDefaultHeader(String name)
        Removes default header used for connections.
        Parameters:
        name - header name
        Returns:
        header value, null if not found

      • setDefaultConnectTimeout

        public void setDefaultConnectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
        Sets default connect timeout for connections. If the connection already has a connect timeout set, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - new default connect timout

      • setDefaultReadTimeout

        public void setDefaultReadTimeout(int readTimeout)
        Sets default read timeout for connections. If the connection already has a connect read set, the default one will not be used.
        Parameters:
        readTimeout - new default read timeout

        public AuthorizationManager getAuthorizationManager()

                                 throws IOException

        Parameters:
        url - url for connection
        Returns:
        HttpURLConnection
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        See Also:
        setProxy(Proxy)

      • setupMethod

        public final RequestBuilder setupMethod(NetworkHelper.Method method,
                         URL url,
                         List<NameValuePair> query)
                                 throws MalformedURLException
        Sets up request builder form method, url and appends query list.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method
        url - web url
        query - url query
        Returns:
        request builder
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - the malformed url exception

        Returns:
        query params

      • getCharset

        public static String getCharset(HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
        Gets the charset from urlConnection. If none found, will return the default UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        urlConnection - connection
        Returns:
        charset

      • getInputStream

        public static InputStream getInputStream(HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets the correct InputStream based on urlConnection encoding.
        Parameters:
        urlConnection - connection
        Returns:
        inputstream from encoding. If not supported returns normal
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred. InputStream

      • getErrorStream

        public static InputStream getErrorStream(HttpURLConnection urlConnection)
                                  throws IOException
        Gets the correct InputStream based on urlConnection encoding.
        Parameters:
        urlConnection - connection
        Returns:
        errorstream from encoding. If not supported returns normal
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred. InputStream
